snippet.title: The Train - BRAND NEW GAME FOR THE GAMEBOY!
snippet.description:
Welcome to the world of The Train, a brand new adventure game for the GameBoy.

The Train is a brand new GameBoy game developed by myself that follows Eve, an innocent girl who's only goal is to help her grandad relive his youth by restoring the village's prized locomotive, The Greyhound, a train that helped the inhabitants of Pilcano Village connect with the rest of the island.

A mainly narrative-driven experience, The Train offers a comedic story that's full of charm and light-heartedness, but it also throws in puzzle elements throughout Eve's journey.

Game available here: https://gnomekinggames.itch.io/the-train
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GnomeKingGames
